MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG3 postcode area of Thornhill, affecting properties in Drumlanrig Castle  and surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have we have been checking the overhead line network but have not located the fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 5pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:12pm on Wednesday, 14 April 2021.
